author: dreiss
msg: thrift_dump is a simple program for converting data from TBinaryProtocol to
TDebugProtocol.  Throw it in contrib because it is pretty primitve.

author: dreiss
msg: Add TFDTransport: a dead-simple wrapper around a file-descriptor.

author: dreiss
msg: TProtocolTap is a protocol that passes reads through to a "source" protocol,
but mirrors them as writes to a "sink" protocol.

author: dreiss
msg: TDebugProtocol: Support a limit on string length.
